title: Is it still possible to get an Unchained Alistar skin?
body:
When I subscribe to League's youtube channel I get an error saying "There was an error adding Unchained Alistar into your account." or something along those lines.

I'm using google chrome btw.

replies.body: It's broken, submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for it.
